name: Hopping for more
description:
[PostJam changes listed at the bottom]
[Advice : Play in Full Screen. Thanks.]
Controls : arrows or WASD to move, F to use, Space to skip dialogues, L to toggle the Log tab, I to toggle the inventory;

Hopping For More is a Space Platformer !
You always dreamt of being an astronaut ? Now is the time !

Did I mention that you are stranded with only your jetpack on the remains of a long abandonned Science Station turned into asteroïds ?
Mah. Details.

made for the Ludum Dare 42 Jam, in 72h

Programming by

Cédric "Poio" Martin - @LeVraiPoio

Music and Sound Design by

PostJam 1.2 changes :

  • deactivated the CHEAT command
  • added a menu
  • added the possibility to quit by pressing Escape

PostJam 1.3 changes : 

  • added a "Loading ..." text to the menu ... because the loading can be fairly long and it could be mistaken for a crash.
  • fixed the rock compressor. Thanks to a bug it didn't need rocks to make concrete so far.
  • Fixed a bits of the HUD to ensure it is readable even in at the end of the game.
  • Made the endgame credits appear only after the final dialog was passed.
